verbose_text: Correlative molecular studies in select patients showed mutations in the PTCH1 gene in nine of ten specimens analyzed, loss of heterozygosity of the PTCH1 gene in one patient 's tumor, SMO-M2 mutations in one patient, PTCH1 mutations in normal skin of a patient with basal-cell nevus syndrome, and elevated Gli-1 mRNA expression in 25 of 26 biopsied tumors.
